fix for race conditions

timeline.bodyText: You should be able to remove this try/catch now
timeline.author: cpmeister

timeline.bodyText:
Instead of this constantly rescheduling itself why not just have it called with a fixed delay.
Then you can have the future canceled inside of tryActionOrPostpone if it doesn't want to be called again?
timeline.author: cpmeister

replies.bodyText: im just afraid to touch this working logic. it must be a reason why it was done in this rather complex way.
replies.author: yfre

replies.bodyText: Yeah, you are right, it is doing some funky logic. Doesn't look like it can really be changed either. After looking more closely I actually kinda like the way it was designed, so yeah, don't change it.
replies.author: cpmeister

timeline.bodyText: should this also change your pending AtomicBoolean here to allow future call attempts?
timeline.author: cpmeister

replies.bodyText: i was thinking of shutdown use cases, so that Debouncer instance will not get re-started anymore.. but probably it can be the case for bundle stop/start. so, i have added reset of pending and calls.
replies.author: yfre

timeline.bodyText: shouldn't this have an override annotation?
timeline.author: cpmeister

timeline.bodyText: Seems wasteful to make multiple calls to storage.get during initialization. You have no idea what kind of storage is used nor how performant that storage is. Please try to minimize interactions with storage as much as possible.
timeline.author: cpmeister

replies.bodyText:
i dont think we can really delay the gets and make kind of lazy loading. homekit need mac, salt and private key to start the server.
but i could reduce number of gets by moving them to initializeStorage. please take a look.
replies.author: yfre
